content: this pattern is available for free a simple tailored beret no fancy stitches just a showcase for a gorgeous yarn soft and light just right for a wintry day in the city of lights… the yarn does all the work in this chic and quick to knit hat keep it simple with a luxe tonal hand painted fabric pair it with a trench coat and a bold scarf and when you go to paris you will be asked for directions i was this is my first published pattern so i would welcome any feedback…
